summary: Battered armour effect for Dwavern armour since i feel it looks too new and smooth for old armour (although i guess it can be made in the smiths but if you found it outside that it would have this texture in all fairness)
descriptionHtml:
Battered armour effect for Dwavern armour since i feel it looks too new and smooth for old armour (although i guess it can be made in the smiths but if you found it outside that it would have this texture in all fairness)

Installation
Extract into the Data folder in your steam directory.

Steam Directory -> steamapps -> common -> skyrim -> Data

Uninstall
Just Delete the folder from the data folder it was saved in.

Tutorial on how to make custom textures yourself
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GSXPxRD1cN0
author: o0o Recon o0o
